replies.body:
> Fuck off shitty community that can't handle playing one of their non-main roles.

FTFY

>F*** off corporate capitalism that has bread organizations to discretely encourage the people in the world to become more narcissistic and selfish.

FTFY
Bread
My dog is a pure bread.

It's not just limited to the autofilled player.

You get autofilled, and play the best to your ability. It's not your main role, so obviously you end up doing worse than you normally would in your main role. Then the rest of your team starts flaming you for not being good, and saying how you should've dodged..

I can handle playing support just fine, i just don't like it.

But getting my first role pick in ranked 4 times in a row and having every one of those be dodges only to get autofilled is stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=Senketsa,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jXQ24HrJ,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-01-29T22:52:02.812+0000)
>
> I can handle playing support just fine, i just don't like it.
> 
> But getting my first role pick in ranked 4 times in a row and having every one of those be dodges only to get autofilled is stupid.

I can honestly say I get my main role 80% of the time and did a study to see how often I'd get autofilled (8-10% of games out of 100).
I also only had dodges in 14-16% of games. So really I don't see why there is so much hate when it really impacts players on a very limited basis.

one quarter of your games then that isn't exactly limited imho

ive dealt with it more often then that though i would say roughly 40-45% of my games are dodges & autofills
mostly dodges though, apparently there is very little punishment for them otherwise i guess they would happen less often

One Quarter??

dude, 14-16% isn't even 1/5.
It is damn near 1/6.

I wouldn't be surprised if your 40-45% was actually 25-30%

8-10% autofill **&** 14-16% dodges

if i take both averages 9% and 15% thats 24% or roughly a quarter

a quarter of your games trolled by autofill due to either you being filled or someone else dodging


and with that number ur lucky

Those statistics are not listed as mutually exclusive.
Being autofilled does not mean the game cannot be dodged.

I personally have games dodged (not by me) more often than not when I am autofilled.

well i guess you are right about them not being mutually exclusive

though i find it hard to believe all your games you were autofilled also had someone dodge

so i guesstimate it to be a minimum of 20% and a maximum of 26% still close to a quarter

I didn't say all of them were dodged, just MOST of them.

I rarely get autofilled tho.

> [{quoted}](name=Spoofghoul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jXQ24HrJ,comment-id=000100020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-30T16:03:23.363+0000)
>
> 8-10% autofill **&** 14-16% dodges
> 
> if i take both averages 9% and 15% thats 24% or roughly a quarter
> 
> a quarter of your games trolled by autofill due to either you being filled or someone else dodging
> 
> 
> and with that number ur lucky

This is just bad math, again.

The percentages are NOT additive. 
You can get a game with a dodge and an auto fill and that doesn't increase the number of games with a dodge/autofill. Over 80% of games were played without being autofilled or dodged out of the 100 I tested. 

Here is the link to the data I collected so you can stop guessing.

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxlyzNcBw0tGYmVPSnFuaDh6NUk

> [{quoted}](name=Spoofghoul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jXQ24HrJ,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2017-01-30T10:54:02.140+0000)
>
> one quarter of your games then that isn't exactly limited imho
> 
> ive dealt with it more often then that though i would say roughly 40-45% of my games are dodges & autofills
> mostly dodges though, apparently there is very little punishment for them otherwise i guess they would happen less often

You've already proven that at least in mathematics you'd fail "Are you smarter than a 5th grader". So I know your 40-45% is greatly inflated. EDIT: (Mathematically you can't auto fill more than 33% of games, less if you're winning them cause you end up in promos.)

1 in 10 games autofilled is pretty limited (and of those autofilled games only 50% of them were support; 1 in 20.)
1 in 6 games had a dodge.

> 1 in 10 games autofilled is pretty limited 

If you are an average player and are getting autofilled 1 in 10 games then the average number of autofilled players in every game you play is 1. Some games will have 0 some games will have 2 but on average there will be an autofilled player every single game.

> [{quoted}](name=sixdogman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jXQ24HrJ,comment-id=000100020000000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-30T16:26:31.264+0000)
>
> If you are an average player and are getting autofilled 1 in 10 games then the average number of autofilled players in every game you play is 1. Some games will have 0 some games will have 2 but on average there will be an autofilled player every single game.

And so 1 player in 10 is autofilling to improve queue times, and this is bad?
Sometimes yes, sometimes no. Just don't be illusioned about how often autofill is affecting games.
Especially when those dodges remove your autofill protection.

That's literally how I got autofilled 4 times in a row. Apparently if you enter champ select it counts as you getting your role despite not playing as it. I usually queue jg/top and I got 4 support roles in a row because I kept having people dodge. Seems like someone has found a way around the system?
I have.. When someone leaves at champ select, restart your search. Hit cancel and than Que up again. Almost always works.

> [{quoted}](name=Iron Wu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jXQ24HrJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-29T08:12:36.361+0000)
>
> I have.. When someone leaves at champ select, restart your search. Hit cancel and than Que up again. Almost always works.

FINALLY FINALLY FINALLY. Someone else that figured this out. I made two threads and about 50 comments telling people to do this, yet this thread always comes up. Funny thing is, a bit of common sense is how I figured it out. I had no one to tell me how to do this.

No! Don't listen to this man. He's a liar. The longer you are in queue, the higher chances you have of getting your role. He's trying to get the roles for himself!

_ I hope some chump falls for this so they get autofilled instead of me_

Normals / Ranked - Get role I want... Dodge.  Get role I want... Dodge.  Get role I want... Dodge.  Get autofilled... Match Starts.

ARAM - Get good champion... Dodge.  Get good champion... Dodge.  Get good champion... Dodge.  Get crappy champion... Match Starts.

olden days normals/ranked - first pick (role you want)... dodge. Second pick (role you want).... dodge. first pick (role you want).... dodge. Last pick (the thing no one else wanted).... match starts.

It's the same shit as the old way, and anyone with a brain could've told people this before they got rid of dynamic queue.
ITT:  People that are too fucking stupid to realize an autofilled person dodged and it had to give someone autofill and it rolled you

It's been proven many times that autofill doesn't give a flying crap about people's preferences.

Like the guy who queued mid gets support and the guy who queue'd support gets mid.
And the moment you get autofilled 100% no one will dodge. every goddamn time

> [{quoted}](name=Be Chillen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jXQ24HrJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-29T17:50:48.011+0000)
>
> And the moment you get autofilled 100% no one will dodge. every goddamn time

Yea so true. I had this problem before I learned how to beat auto-fill.

OMG, for the love of....How is it that people have not figured this out yet. When someone dodges, restart the queue to avoid auto-fill. Don't just accept the next queue without restarting.

Could we stop making these threads now please.

Just remember that good guys finish last, why do you think all the other 4 got dodged? Becuase someone got autofilled, and when you are the one who gets autofilled and the other 4 get their roles they obviously won't dodge because if there is anyone who will dodge it will be you as the autofill.

I've noticed that the only times I usually get autofilled is after a matchmaking dodge, not a queue dodge.
So I'm not positive if this helps, but after a matchmaking dodge, try cancelling the queue and restarting it.
